data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio Jalisco.
In Guadalajara Pumas UNAM attack through Sebastian Saucedo. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 1, It's a goal kick for the home team in Guadalajara.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
In the minute 6, Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Atlas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Jalisco.
In the minute 8, Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Juan Dinenno (Pumas UNAM) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 9, Atlas have a goal kick.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
Jorge Perez awards Atlas a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Jalisco.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 15, Free kick Atlas.
At Estadio Jalisco, Nicolas Freire has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Atlas drives forward and Lorenzo Reyes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 17, Favio Alvarez for Pumas UNAM gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Jorge Perez awards Atlas a goal kick.
Jorge Perez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 19, Jorge Perez signals a Atlas throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of Atlas.
Throw-in for Atlas in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Atlas in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Guadalajara to check on Ignacio Jeraldino, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 23, Ignacio Jeraldino returns to the field for Atlas after picking up a slight injury.
Ignacio Jeraldino for Atlas has been booked by Jorge Perez and receives a first yellow card.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
Atlas have a dangerous throw-in.
Ignacio Jeraldino (Atlas) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 30, Atlas have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Corner awarded to Atlas.
Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlas's half?
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
Free kick Atlas.
In the minute 35, Sebastian Saucedo (Pumas UNAM) has received a first yellow card.
Atlas's Lorenzo Reyes goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 37, Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
Attention is being given to Pumas UNAMâ€™s Favio Alvarez and play has been suspended briefly.
Throw-in for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
In the minute 39, In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM are coming forward and Carlos Gutierrez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
In the minute 41, Favio Alvarez for Pumas UNAM is back on the field again.
Goal! Juan Dinenno heads Pumas UNAM into a 0-1 lead.
Favio Alvarez instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 44, Jorge Perez awards the home team a throw-in.
Atlas's Lorenzo Reyes has been booked in Guadalajara.
In the minute 45, Jorge Perez blows to end the first-half.
Andres Lillini (Pumas UNAM) is making a fourth substitution, with Juan Iturbe replacing Favio Alvarez.
The second half has started at Estadio Jalisco.
Atlas's Ignacio Malcorra breaks free at Estadio Jalisco. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 47, It's a goal kick for the away team in Guadalajara.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Pumas UNAM attack but Carlos Gutierrez's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Jorge Perez signals a Atlas throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 50, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Ignacio Malcorra gets an equalizer for Atlas. The score is now 1-1.
Atlas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 54, Atlas's Ignacio Malcorra gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Guadalajara.
Free kick for Atlas in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Atlas close to the penalty box.
Andres Lillini is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Jalisco with Alan Mozo replacing Sebastian Saucedo.
Atlas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 59, Free kick Pumas UNAM.
Luciano Acosta (Atlas) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 61, Pumas UNAM are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Guadalajara Atlas drive forward through Ignacio Malcorra. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Jalisco.
In the minute 67, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
Jorge Perez awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Atlas in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 69, Atlas will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Pumas UNAM.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
Free kick for Atlas in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 72, Atlas's Javier Correa has run offside.
Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Atlas to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
In the minute 74, Lorenzo Reyes of Atlas smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Atlas.
Atlas surge into the attack at Estadio Jalisco but Javier Correaâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 75, Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
Throw-in Atlas.
In the minute 77, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The away team have replaced Carlos Gutierrez with Alejandro Mayorga. This is the second substitution made today by Andres Lillini.
In the minute 78, Jorge Perez signals a Atlas throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Brian Figueroa is replacing Jero Rodriguez for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Jalisco.
Favio Alvarez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 80, Atlas to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Rafael Puente (Atlas) is making a first substitution, with Jairo Torres replacing Luciano Acosta.
The home team replace Ignacio Jeraldino with Jairo Munngaray.
In the minute 82, Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atlas needs to be cautious. Pumas UNAM have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in Atlas.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Atlas drive upfield and Jesus Isijara gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Pumas UNAM defender.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Atlas.
Can Atlas capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pumas UNAM's half?
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Jalisco.
In the minute 87, Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlas's half?
Jorge Perez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 89, Juan Dinenno scores with a header and the away team now lead 1-2.
That's a fine assist from Juan Iturbe.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Atlas in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Throw-in for Atlas in their own half.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 1-2.
Andres Lillini is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio Jalisco with Amaury Garcia Moreno replacing Juan Dinenno.
Jorge Perez waits before resuming play because Lorenzo Reyes for Atlas is still down.
